dcterms:creator: Serge Bobbia
Richard Macwan
Yannick Benezeth
Alamin Mansouri
Julien Dubois
dcterms:description: The UBFC-rPPG dataset includes 42 high-quality facial videos, each featuring a simultaneous recording of both PPG signals and heart rates. Each video boasts a crisp resolution of 640x480 pixels and a smooth frame rate of 30 frames per second (FPS).
dcterms:title: UBFC-rPPG

dcterms:creator: Ronny Stricker
Steffen Muller
Horst-Michael Gross
dcterms:description: The PURE dataset comprises 60 facial videos of 10 participants, captured during a data collection process that involved asking the subjects to perform six types of head movements (including small and medium rotations, slow and fast translations, talking, and steady positions) in front of a camera for one minute. The videos were recorded at a frame rate of 30 frames per second and a resolution of 640 x 480 pixels. Simultaneously, the ground truth PPG signals were collected using a finger clip pulse oximeter with a sampling rate of 60 Hz.
dcterms:title: PURE

dcterms:creator: Jiankai Tang
Kequan Chen
Yuntao Wang
Yuanchun Shi
Shwetak Patel
Daniel McDuff
Xin Liu
dcterms:description: The MMPD dataset is an extensive repository of 11 hours of Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra mobile phone recordings from 33 participants. Captured at 30 frames per second and originally rendered at 1280×720 pixels, the videos were later scaled down to 320×240 pixels for efficient storage and transfer. The dataset includes diverse scenarios such as different lighting conditions and activities.
dcterms:title: MMPD
